algorithm.name: WHISPERDETECTION
algorithm.description: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model to perform language detection in speech.

properties.name: WHISPER_MODEL_LANG
properties.description: Whisper has English-only models and multilingual models. Set to english for English-only models and multi for multilingual models.

properties.name: WHISPER_MODEL_SIZE
properties.description: Whisper models come in multiple sizes; tiny, base, small, medium, and large. Multilingual models are available in all 5 sizes, English-only is not available in large.

properties.name: WHISPER_MODEL
properties.description: Set to 0 for spoken language detection, 1 for speech-to-text transcription, and 2 for speech translation.

actions.name: WHISPER DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model to perform language detection in speech.

tasks.name: WHISPER DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model to perform language detection in speech.
